subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The victory will make the Patriots the undisputed favorite to win the Super Bowl as they continue their bid to become the only team since the 1972 Miami Dolphins to complete an undefeated N.F.L. season.
snippet: The victory will make the Patriots the undisputed favorite to win the Super Bowl as they continue their bid to become the only team since the 1972 Miami Dolphins to complete an undefeated N.F.L. season.
